languages.text: Улицы Райкада Минорис охвачены пламенем восстания — путь по ним может оказаться опасным. Пройдя сквозь гущу мятежа, Лорд-капитан сможет выяснить, что еще творится в тени пылающих столичных улиц.

traits.locale_text: Улицы Райкада Минорис охвачены пламенем восстания — путь по ним может оказаться опасным. Пройдя сквозь гущу мятежа, Лорд-капитан сможет выяснить, что еще творится в тени пылающих столичных улиц.

languages.text: The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.
languages.original_text: Улицы Райкада Минорис охвачены пламенем восстания — путь по ним может оказаться опасным. Пройдя сквозь гущу мятежа, Лорд-капитан сможет выяснить, что еще творится в тени пылающих столичных улиц.

traits.locale_text: The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

languages.text: Die Flammen der Rebellion haben die Straßen von Rykad Minoris erreicht, was eine Durchquerung enorm gefährlich macht. Der Lord Captain muss durch die umkämpfte Stadt gelangen, um herauszufinden, welche anderen üblen Ereignisse sich in den Schatten der brennenden Hauptstadt abspielen.
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

traits.locale_text: Die Flammen der Rebellion haben die Straßen von Rykad Minoris erreicht, was eine Durchquerung enorm gefährlich macht. Der Lord Captain muss durch die umkämpfte Stadt gelangen, um herauszufinden, welche anderen üblen Ereignisse sich in den Schatten der brennenden Hauptstadt abspielen.

languages.text: Les flammes de la rébellion dévorent les rues de Rykad Minoris, ce qui rend leur traversée particulièrement hasardeuse. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit progresser à travers la capitale en feu et dévastée par la guerre pour découvrir quels autres terribles évènements se trament dans ses ruelles sombres.
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

traits.locale_text: Les flammes de la rébellion dévorent les rues de Rykad Minoris, ce qui rend leur traversée particulièrement hasardeuse. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} doit progresser à travers la capitale en feu et dévastée par la guerre pour découvrir quels autres terribles évènements se trament dans ses ruelles sombres.

languages.text: 反乱の炎がライカド・ミノリスの街を飲み込み、通りを横断するのは大変な危険を伴う。燃え盛る首都惑星の陰でどんな邪悪な出来事が繰り広げられているのかを知るために、ロード・キャプテンは戦乱の街を突き進まなければならない。
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

traits.locale_text: 反乱の炎がライカド・ミノリスの街を飲み込み、通りを横断するのは大変な危険を伴う。燃え盛る首都惑星の陰でどんな邪悪な出来事が繰り広げられているのかを知るために、ロード・キャプテンは戦乱の街を突き進まなければならない。

languages.text: Las llamas de la rebelión engullen las calles de Rykad Minoris, por lo que recorrerlas se ha vuelto tremendamente peligroso. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe atravesar la ciudad asolada por la guerra para descubrir qué otras atrocidades transcurren en las sombras de la capital ardiente.
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

traits.locale_text: Las llamas de la rebelión engullen las calles de Rykad Minoris, por lo que recorrerlas se ha vuelto tremendamente peligroso. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán debe atravesar la ciudad asolada por la guerra para descubrir qué otras atrocidades transcurren en las sombras de la capital ardiente.

languages.text: 叛乱的战火吞没了小莱卡德的街道，穿过街道的旅途变得危机四伏。领主舰长必须穿过这座饱受战乱蹂躏的城市，了解熊熊燃烧的首都发生了什么事情，弄清阴影之中潜伏着怎样的阴谋。
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

traits.locale_text: 叛乱的战火吞没了小莱卡德的街道，穿过街道的旅途变得危机四伏。领主舰长必须穿过这座饱受战乱蹂躏的城市，了解熊熊燃烧的首都发生了什么事情，弄清阴影之中潜伏着怎样的阴谋。

languages.text: İsyan ateşi Rykad Minoris sokaklarını sarınca içlerinden yol almak da tehlikeli bir hâl almış. Lord Kaptan, yanan başkentin kuytularında başka ne gibi uğursuz hadiselerin vuku bulduğunu öğrenmek için savaşın yıktığı şehri yararak ilerlemeli.
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion have engulfed the streets of Rykad Minoris, making traversing them a dangerous endeavour. The Lord Captain must push through the war-torn city to learn what other wicked events are unfolding among the shadows of the burning capital.

traits.locale_text: İsyan ateşi Rykad Minoris sokaklarını sarınca içlerinden yol almak da tehlikeli bir hâl almış. Lord Kaptan, yanan başkentin kuytularında başka ne gibi uğursuz hadiselerin vuku bulduğunu öğrenmek için savaşın yıktığı şehri yararak ilerlemeli.
